lab.server.processing

Class ClientID

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab.server.processing.ClientID

  • public class ClientID
extends java.lang.Object
    ClientID encapsulate IP address and port of client to use it for identification. Object are received by invocation of fabrication method that returns already existing object or creates new one.
    Since:
    1.6.0
